PmtStreams.//: To compute the term, set the payment to the desired amount
PmtStreams.//_: then set the term to the maximum permissible. Finally, set
PmtStreams.//-: the ComputeTerm attribute to true. The SCE will automatically
PmtStreams.//!: shorten the term of the loan and return the first equal pmt
PmtStreams.//|: loan whose payment is less than or equal to the specified pmt.
